rules.description: Change spacebar to left_shift. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
caps_lock to left_control or escape (if alone)
right_command to backspace if alone (with left_command and left_option swapped support) and right_command if combined with an other key
left_command to enter if pressed alone
left_control + i/j/k/l == vim directional Keys. Supports left_option and left_command for jumps and left_shift for highlighting
